claim: Very few Covid-19 patients in an hospital in Belgium, where situation is not as serious as said in medias.
label: FALSE

claim: Empty hospital interiors are a proof that pandemic of SARS-CoV-2 is a media panic.
label: MISLEADING

claim: A person developed paraplegia after receiving the AstraZeneca vaccine in Ghudushauri hospital and this information is hidden.
label: FALSE

claim: Video shows a German-speaking man roaming the Batumi Republican Hospital and filming empty corridors and wards. The man concludes that since there are no covid-infected patients there, the pandemic has ended in Georgia and that AstraZeneca vaccine, rejected by Europe, has been brought to Georgia.
label: FALSE

claim: Hospitals in Ukraine are “unreasonably” full of patients with COVID-19.
label: FALSE

claim: Government from the Brazilian state of Ceará staged hospital chaos on video.
label: FALSE

claim: Photo from 2016 shows a crowded hospital room, with people sitting on the floor.
label: FALSE

claim: Indignant NURSE calls the press and talks about what is happening in hospitals (VERY SERIOUS). She said that the order is to intubate all patients and then lower the oxygen, to increase the number of deaths and justify the lockdown, to break the economy and try to destabilize the Federal Government. It is a VERY SERIOUS denunciation it is a great genocide they are literally killing people, Absurd. We will see if this will be reported in the press.
label: FALSE

claim: The former employee of the hospital in Romania publicly accused the hospital of improper treatment of coronavirus patients and acknowledged that patients were murdered by administering sedative drugs with the aim of increasing the coronavirus figures.
label: PARTLY FALSE

claim: Mexican hospitals warned that the “incubation” of the virus will begin on March 25
label: FALSE

label: FALSE

label: Missing Context

claim: Nurse reveals a plan from hospitals to kill patients taking off their supply of oxygen and causing chaos.
